title: Remember Love
description: Four years ago, Brenna James left her small town behind for college two hours away in the largest city in the state. Throughout the years Brenna would go home for the holidays and visit her mother and papa when she could. It was a rare occasion for Brenna to stay the night, there was always a reason to get back to school. Now with less than a month left before graduation Brenna must return to her hometown for the weekend. She had no idea that this trip could change everything. Brenna thought she had her life planned out then fate stepped in and brought a guest. None other than her childhood best friend, Tucker Wade, the one person she spent years trying to forget. Emotions Brenna has never felt try to take over her body and mind, leaving her with two options. Go back to college and forget she saw him or try to remember that time that has been a long time forgotten. Tucker refuses to let this chance slip away, is it too late for them to regain what used to be, will he open himself up allowing Brenna to see inside his heart while he tries to slip back into hers?Will Brenna let Tucker help her remember love?
author: Riley Rhea
